thread.section_title: CandyWarehouse.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CandyWarehouse.com | www.candywarehouse.com | 5 of 23
thread.title: jeanne vance

author: jeanne vance
title: jeanne vance
text:
I had been trying to find a certain sour lemon candy that I had bought years ago. I had bought probably 10 different kinds in hopes of finding the right one.
I had found it at the Candy warehouse, about 3 years ago, and went back to them to order again. But what I received was not the same as before. I found out through Candy warehouse that the Belgium manufacturer was not producing it anymore.
The Candy warehouse gladly refunded my money.
